Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Aw, man. Looks like your pouch is full.


I was gonna give you a <clr:0000>sticky elixir<clr:ffff> too.
Never leave home without one!<sp:5:0:0>

Talk to me again once you've got some
room in your pouch!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Wakeup_00>Right then... <sp:5:0:0>Now to finally take that nap.<sp:5:1:0>
I might even splurge on a SOFT bed!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, look who's back!<sp:5:0:0> Did you make
space in your pouch?

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Huh. Guess you didn't.


I'm telling ya, this <clr:0000>sticky elixir<clr:ffff> is a
traveling essential.<sp:5:0:0> Come back when
you've got the room to carry it!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You're KIDDING me.


You found him sleeping in a tent?! And
you had to wake him up?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ah... <sp:5:0:0>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Was...was that just a dream?<sp:5:1:0>
And...where am I?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>That's right. I was changing the beds!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, th-thank you for waking me up.<sp:0:4:0>I need to hurry back to the inn.<sp:5:1:0> Oooh, that
traveler's going to be so mad at me...
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:CallFar_01>Hey! You make space in your pouch yet?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh, you sure haven't. I mean, no rush
or anything, but, uh...<sp:5:0:0>

<snd:TalkPositive_00>I still want to give you that <clr:0000>sticky elixir<clr:ffff>.
It's good stuff! Come back when you can
actually carry it.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>Welcome, friend!


Those eyelids feeling heavy? Then you've
come to the right place!

Pick any bed in this inn, and it's yours
for a paltry<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>10,000 rupees<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:CallFar_01>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> That pouch is looking a whole lot
roomier now.

You're gonna love this stuff.<sp:5:0:0> Here!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>It's a high-quality concoction made of
four sticky frogs and a Bokoblin horn.

Should come in handy on your rainy-day
adventures.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>Oh, hearty truffle...<sp:5:0:0> You're the only...
fungus for me.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Hahaha! I'm joking! You should have seen
the look on your face. Whew... <sp:5:1:0>Yeah.
I don't even work here.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I stopped by hoping to catch some Zs
when the owner up and asked me to keep
an eye on the place.
He said he had to go make up the beds in
the <clr:0000>survey-team tents<clr:ffff> and that he'd be
right back, but, uh...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>I don't think he's coming back.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I want to look for him, but there are
four <clr:0000>tent camps<clr:ffff> in this village and only
one me.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Could you maybe track down the <clr:0000>owner<clr:ffff>
and tell him to come back already?

If you run across some sleepy-looking guy
spacing out, you've found your man.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Sidetracked?! You're lucky I don't track
my boot on your backside! <sp:5:0:0>Well, you're
here now, so all is forgiven.
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>If you want to stay here, you'll need to
<clr:0000>bring back the owner<clr:ffff>.

He's pretty easy to recognizeâ€”sleepy
guy, spaces out a lot... You'll know him
when you see him.
He said he was going to change the
survey team's beds, so maybe he's in
one of their <clr:0000>four places with tents<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And that means I don't have to watch the
place anymore! <sp:5:0:0>Thanks for the help, bud.
Here's a little something for your trouble.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Sorry, I don't actually work here.


I stopped in for a nap, and right when
I was getting comfy, the owner asked me
to watch the inn for him.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>But he still hasn't come back!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>*sniff* *snorffff* A gentle aroma with a
strong, hearty undertone...

My dear hearty truffle, I have you now!
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>My lovely...<sp:5:0:0>hearty truffle... Fungus of my
dreams... Your aroma is unmistakable...<sp:0:4:0>You may hide...but my nose knows...
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>Heyyy, there you are! <sp:5:0:0>Sounds like I've got
you to thank for waking this guy up.

No more watching the inn for me!<sp:5:0:0> Here's
a little something for giving me back my
free time.
